SEARCH
Package ProgettoLaboratorioB.Client

Class Client

java.lang.Object
ProgettoLaboratorioB.Client.Client
public class Client extends Object
Client class is the class that the client uses to connect to the server. The client can use the methods defined in the interface using the remote object of the server. The RMI registry creates the remote object.
Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Enrico Artese

  • Method Details

    • GetConnection

      public static void GetConnection(Boolean useDefaultIP) throws RemoteException
      This method initializes the connection with the server, using the RMI registry.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the client is not connected with the server.
      NotBoundException - if an attempt is made to look up or unbind in the registry, a name that has no associated binding.
      ConnectException - Server is offline; signals that an error occurred while attempting to connect a socket to a remote address and port.
